name: Window-less
description:
Window-less is a pretty simple game, you are "Running out of space" as the window the game is played in slowly shrinks. You need to collect the star to prevent the window from shrinking.

This is my first game and first Ludum Dare game for Ludum Dare 42.

I started learning SDL just before the event so I'm aware the game isn't amazing and is missing a lot of what I hoped to add, however I liked the concept and wanted to finish something.
